random_circuit.description: Random circuit with no geometric structure
random_circuit.expected_result: No geometric evolution, no causal asymmetry

decoy_geometries.description: Different geometries should show different patterns
decoy_geometries.expected_result: High variance in temporal asymmetry across geometries

noise_injection.description: Systematic noise should not create geometric structure
noise_injection.expected_result: Low temporal asymmetry even with high noise

entanglement_validation.description: Verify genuine quantum correlations vs classical noise
entanglement_validation.expected_result: Quantum signatures present, classical noise absent

causal_robustness.description: Causal asymmetry should be robust and correlate with curvature
causal_robustness.expected_result: Stable under entanglement variation, correlated with curvature
